extendedInfo.description: The New BSV Mobile--BetaThis Mobile Banking app is currently in beta testing. Information shown may not accurately reflect the bank's records of your account(s). The Bank of Southside Virginia (BSV) assumes no liability for actions that you take based on data from this app.We value your opinion, and we appreciate any feedback you would like to share with us. Please email us at customer.care@bsvnet.comThe BSV Mobile App is a free mobile decision-support tool that gives you the ability to aggregate all of your financial accounts, including accounts from other financial institutions, into a single, up-to-the-minute view so you can stay organized and make smarter financial decisions. It is fast, secure and makes life easier by empowering you with the tools you need to manage your personal finances.FEATURESMulti-Account Aggregation: View all of your financial information (balances, transaction history, merchant spending averages) in one place for on-the-go organization.Bill Discovery: The app will automatically identify bills within your list of transactions and display a reminder to you when upcoming bills are due.Alerts & Notifications: Set alerts for low funds and be notified about upcoming bills.Add Tags, Notes, Images & Geo-Information: By enhancing transactions with custom tags, notes or photos of a receipt or check, you have the ability to stay organized and find exactly what youâre looking for when searching through your finances.Contact: Locate ATMs or branches and contact Bank of Southside Virginia customer service directly from the app.SAFE AND SECUREThe app utilizes the same bank-level security that protects you when youâre on Internet Banking by using advanced encryption technology. The app also features a unique 4-digit passcode setting that prevents unauthorized access.GETTING STARTEDTo use the BSV Mobile App, you must be enrolled as an Bank of Southside Virginia Internet Banking user. If you currently use our Internet Banking, simply download the app, launch it, and login with the same Internet Banking credentials. After you successfully login to the app, your accounts and transactions will begin updating.

reviews.title: BSV MOBIL
reviews.comment: love the convince of the app, but wish I could do more then just check my balance....When they fix that I will gladly give 5 stars
reviews.author: Anthony Carter

reviews.title: Antiquated
reviews.comment: It\'s good for checking your balance only.
reviews.author: Craazzydave Michelin

reviews.title: Great App for BSV
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app. I can easily check my balances and view transactions and make transfers. I can also receive notifications about upcoming bills and low balances.  Only reason I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 is because I would like to have the ability to make credit card payments via the app.
reviews.author: DaJaynae Williams
